content:
I wish...
There was a place where you never had to wake up early!
Unless, of course, I actually wanted to wake up early...

Quite the opposite.
I want to "express" myself.
Or rather, express a moment of who I am.

Don't you think breaking open rocks is just like scratching a lottery ticket?
That moment when you reveal what's hidden inside...
Isn't it totally wild?

The DIY Cards must have given you lots of creative inspiration, right?
I've designed cards with kings, knights, and jesters too,
but I never wanted to actually make them.

Among Tala's records, there's a collection of commercial jingles.
Since they weren't included in the official release,
they're printed on the back of the record.

Do you like bugs or butterflies?
I can't really tell those tiny things apart.
Except for fireflies!

Every day I choose a new mask,
Sometimes I even make them myself,
It's not that I want to isolate myself,

But I won't give up, Manna!
I'll definitely find a way to fix my neckerchief!

When wandering outside,
what I miss most is a bowl of hot soup.
Speaking of which, the spicy hotpot broth from Metropolis is perfect for cold weather.

I've been cooped up in the dojo training for so long that I've hit a plateau.
I need a change of scenery to refresh my mind,
and push past my limits!

Traveling without a set route always makes me happy,
Every corner brings a surprising new view,
Since I'll get lost anyway, using navigation or not makes no difference.

When you take a stroll, it's easier to calm your mind
And discover the beauty around you,
If you walk too fast, you'll only focus on catching your breath.

So floofy...
<color=#695c3a>I wanna pet it...</color>
{短暂停}Oh, it's nothing.

I love the vibrant colors of nature under clear skies,
and I also love how rain gives nature's colors a misty quality,
but on windy days, {短暂停}I just stay inside, it's not safe~.

Though I'm not very good at catching them,
in places with good ecological environments,
we're bound to discover more new creatures, right?

I hope I get lost and end up in a vast wilderness,
with enough space to build a huge house,
then fill it with all my precious gems from boxes and bundles galore!

Stylists always tell their clients to be true to themselves,
not to be bound by others' opinions,
then proceed to revise their suggestions over and over based on client feedback.

The magic of a camera lies in freezing memories and time into eternity,
Memories fade, and photos,{短暂停}photos fade too,
Some photos fade into pretty new colors though, it's quite lovely~.

Places I've never been, things I've never seen,
And dangers I've never encountered!
Getting lost is entertainment, bhan!
In martial arts novels, the protagonist always seems to fall off a cliff, only to meet some legendary master and learn ultimate martial arts techniques.

I've noticed that numbers have different meanings in different places.
In some places, 2 is considered the greatest.
But in other places, they use 6 or 8 to mean something's amazing.

This makes me think...
We should design different card rules
for different countries.

My part-time work schedule is already packed for this month,
but no matter how I crunch the numbers, I still don't have
enough savings to buy new plum blossom stakes.

I've been hopping between Bubble Worlds lately,
My clients can't find me,
And they seem... quite anxious about it.

But in reality, martial arts training isn't full of all these
"perfect coincidences"!
<size=30>Though I must admit, I am curious if such cliffs really exist.</size>

About chat topics... (thinking)
Oh, supernatural oddities,
They're basically "inanimate objects" that exhibit strange behaviors.

...Oh!
Just saw
a squirrel!

Understanding how things work,
Following rules brings knowledge,
When life's rules are clear, we understand each other without words.

When I'm wandering outside,
I love listening to that album.
The music on the B-side feels just like my life.

You know what they say, "the taller you are, the stronger you get."
Being taller would definitely help improve my martial arts skills.
But... how do I actually grow taller?

When I was younger,
I joined a trainee program for actors,
and that's how I developed a trauma about waking up early!
I still love watching them, though I haven't really thought about why.

Do you believe there are treasures hidden in each world bubble?
When I'm out exploring,
I always keep an eye out for special markers.

But there's still a one-in-ten-thousand chance it's related to
some legendary martial arts manual...
Should I go take a peek?

What?! I missed both breakfast AND lunch?!
Then that means—
I missed out on SIX servings of yummy meat!

Whenever a firefly floats by,
my paws develop a mind of their own,
so it's not my fault, Bhan!

My neckerchief was a gift from Mom before I left home,
but while I was practicing martial arts, I got too intense
and caught it on a wooden post, tearing a hole in it.

I often get lost in places full of flowers and plants,
but when it comes to rocky areas,
I can actually find my way around pretty well.

"Feasting on beauty" is nature's biggest lie,
Today I got so immersed in the scenery that I got hungry again,
Hmm, looks like... I forgot to eat again.

Oh, waking up on a weekday,
It's already dusk,
I need a cup of coffee.

People have asked if I get scared traveling alone,
And yes, I do when it's late and quiet,
So I take out my phone and turn it on.

I heard there's a place with hidden treasure,
Though when you hear the word "treasure,"
You'd probably think of gold, silver, and jewels.

I've been hunting for supernatural curiosities lately,
and searching for the "There's More" Curiosity Shop.
Judging by your vitality, I'm guessing you haven't seen it.

Oh, I didn't lose it.
The shop was filled with all sorts of mysterious artifacts and strange tales,
Then one day I woke up, and the shop had vanished—along with everyone else.

I can't listen anymore,
I must go to bed early tonight!
.......................I mean it!

Many poems were written after witnessing various wonders,
maybe I should try going down that path too,
and activate my poetic senses?

One time while I was wandering around,
I fished up a bunch of books following some markers,
It seemed to be something called "The Archiboo Language Encyclopedia."

Who would be so inconsiderate,
leaving useless stuff lying around?!
It's blocking the light from the real treasures!

Whenever I go out, I assess the people I meet,
And think of topics to discuss.
So when I'm ready, if we ever meet again.

According to our school's martial arts manual,
the best way to master the "Immovable as Mountain" technique is to go fishing.
It sounds logical at first, but something feels a bit off when you think about it.

Oh, I was just thinking...
Haven't had much time lately to craft new things.
The tools I make myself always work better for me.

An object that shouldn't be alive,
Abnormally gained vitality,
Affecting living things, oh, living people.

Such supernatural oddities
have no place in normal life.
I will deal with them. (draws short blade "Monster Head")
I wanted to fix it myself, but after checking a sewing guide, I realized I don't even have the materials... *sigh*

Having to rush before dawn
to wash up, put on makeup, and practice the tightrope dance I just learned last night!
And I can only have two eggs for breakfast!

In my dictionary,
the words "prohibition" and "rules" don't exist—
I ate those pages!

But most people don't have rules for living,
So they must chat.
Oh, what rules does chatting follow?

As you can see, I've forgotten where I took off from.
I didn't note down the wind direction on my balloon either.
Where do you think I came from?

It's good that you haven't seen it before.
Oh, it's not dangerous - it's where I used to live,
A curiosity shop passed down from my ancestors.

Hmm... in the veins around here,
there seem to be some big colorful treasures,
and some little blue ones...

Capturing every detail of the scenery on paper,
that's the painter's unique romance.
As for us stylists, we're more childlike - we just play with blocks of color~.

That's right, all these rocks around here were mined by yours truly, bhan!
Not a single ore
Can escape my watchful eye!

About chat topics... (thinking)
I've been hopping between various disordered worlds lately, hunting for supernatural oddities.
Been going through coffee beans so fast, haven't had time to restock.

298, 299, 300...
I've listened to 300 episodes of Parade Station's late-night ghost stories,
which means I've been sleepless for a whopping 300 days!

I don't like doing repetitive things,
They wear down my enthusiasm for life.
Repetitive scenery? Hmm, that's an interesting question.

Oh, it's not that we must control everything,
But any supernatural oddity
Cannot be left unchecked.

Some beautiful sights are best enjoyed at night,
like the hillside of evening primrose where fireflies dance.
If you've seen it before, would you show me the way?

I don't like sweet drinks,
And I don't like salty ones either.
That's right, the spicier the better, I dare you to prove me wrong...

But they're quite shy and hide deep inside,
No worries! I just love shy...
Gems!

The "Eighteen Fists of Lobster Subduing" is my worst technique,
so I should probably find an opponent who's on my level
to break through this martial arts plateau, right?
Is there any other way to earn a bit more money?

Sometimes, I catch a ride with strangers going my way.
Hopping into a car without knowing the destination,
For me, it's a way to de-stress. Just like now.

Running through the wilderness, listening to the wind whistling past my ears,
Watching leaves dance up with each step I take,
I call this my "digestive exercise."

Oh, I was just thinking...
After my old "And More" Curiosity Shop disappeared,
I wonder how clients looking to deal with supernatural items will find me.

When I wake up in different worlds,
Sometimes I discover creatures I've never seen before.
Looks like we're not the only actors on this world stage.

You can find DIY Benches in many chaotic bubble worlds,
but the ways and timing to obtain materials
are quite unpredictable.

About chat topics... (thinking)
Most supernatural oddities prefer to be active at night,
vanishing without a trace during the day. I follow the same pattern - it's the most effective way to track them down.

About the topic of chatting... (thinking)
Yesterday morning, when I was feeling drowsy,
I saw two neighbors whose houses were right next to each other open their windows at the same time and spot each other.

So meeting you at this very moment,
In every sense of the word,
Is quite the coincidence.

Letting them perform in my mind,
Collecting different card "outfits,"
It's fun just doing that alone.

Find the festive music in the playlist,
Hit play,
And watch all those scary feelings melt away~.

About chatting... (thinking)
I don't understand the rules of conversation.
To me, interacting with others is just a way to gather information.
